afk.about_me: I am a curious problem-solver, who likes to try himself in various roles. At the end of 2023 I started to redifining myself. I decided to make a big change and leave the navigation software industry to jump into web development. I am interested in learning everything about React and React-Native. Even in complex project I keep the customer’s satisfaction in focus. I do take roles in every part of the development porcess from ideation, development to operation. I like to work in a cheerful group setting, but it is important for me to take ownership of my tasks and give them my all. If you see a camera in my hand, don’t panic, it is my guilty pleasure. Capturing unique moment in my life helps me maintain my creative side.

description: I was in charge of development lifecycle of our navigation software: Java, XScript.
I was one of the key members of our UI SDK and API development team. I have prepared more than 90% of the Android SDK, documentation and live examples.
I worked with international clients, contributed to on-site testing in the Nordics.
I was part of an R&D team working on a new generation of car infotainment systems. We designed and implemented the UX and UI in an embedded environment.
I was responsible for the iGO interface. Used Lua to power our very own UI markup language processor. Our customers included: SAIC Motors, Pioneer and Ferrari.
I worked on a Delphi application to support security cameras, traffic and parking observation systems. My focus was around user interface, interactions, image handling.
